attributes.action: This Country Has No Confidence In Her Majesty's Government. Disolve Parliament
attributes.additional_details: In 2016 we had a referendum on our EU membership, the result was the majority (17.4 million) voted leave. In the 2017 election, both of the main parties stood on manifestos promising that they would honour the result and we would leave. 108 times in the house of commons the Prime Minister promised we would leave on the 29th of March. (she lied) That then became 12th of April (another lie)  Now we have been told the 31st of October. this is unacceptable to the people of the UK demand an election
attributes.background:
We the People of the UK have been betrayed and lied to by the Prime Minister and the Government.  
We the people of the UK declare the motion "That this country has no confidence in Her Majesty's Government" We demand that Parliament is disolved and a General Election is now Called.
